com.arthenica.mobileffmpeg

Class FFmpeg

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arthenica.mobileffmpeg.FFmpeg

  • public class FFmpeg
extends java.lang.Object

    Main class for FFmpeg operations. Provides execute(String...) method to execute FFmpeg commands. 

          int rc = FFmpeg.execute("-i", "file1.mp4", "-c:v", "libxvid", "file1.avi");
      Log.i(Config.TAG, String.format("Command execution %s.", (rc == 0?"completed successfully":"failed with rc=" + rc));
    Since:
    v1.0

    • Method Detail

      • getFFmpegVersion

        public static java.lang.String getFFmpegVersion()

        Returns FFmpeg version bundled within the library.

        Returns:
        FFmpeg version

      • getVersion

        public static java.lang.String getVersion()

        Returns MobileFFmpeg library version.

        Returns:
        MobileFFmpeg version

      • execute

        public static int execute(java.lang.String[] arguments)

        Synchronously executes FFmpeg with arguments provided.

        Parameters:
        arguments - FFmpeg command options/arguments as string array
        Returns:
        zero on successful execution, 255 on user cancel and non-zero on error

      • execute

        public static int execute(java.lang.String command,
                          java.lang.String delimiter)

        Synchronously executes FFmpeg command provided. Command is split into arguments using provided delimiter.

        Parameters:
        command - FFmpeg command
        delimiter - delimiter used between arguments
        Returns:
        zero on successful execution, 255 on user cancel and non-zero on error
        Since:
        3.0

      • execute

        public static int execute(java.lang.String command)

        Synchronously executes FFmpeg command provided. Space character is used to split command into arguments.

        Parameters:
        command - FFmpeg command
        Returns:
        zero on successful execution, 255 on user cancel and non-zero on error

      • cancel

        public static void cancel()

        Cancels an ongoing operation. This function does not wait for termination to complete and returns immediately.

      • getLastReturnCode

        public static int getLastReturnCode()

        Returns return code of last executed command.

        Returns:
        return code of last executed command
        Since:
        3.0

      • getLastCommandOutput

        public static java.lang.String getLastCommandOutput()

        Returns log output of last executed command. Please note that disabling redirection using Config.disableRedirection() method also disables this functionality.

        Returns:
        output of last executed command
        Since:
        3.0

      • getMediaInformation

        public static MediaInformation getMediaInformation(java.lang.String path)

        Returns media information for given file.

        Parameters:
        path - path or uri of media file
        Returns:
        media information
        Since:
        3.0

      • getMediaInformation

        public static MediaInformation getMediaInformation(java.lang.String path,
                                                   java.lang.Long timeout)

        Returns media information for given file.

        Parameters:
        path - path or uri of media file
        timeout - complete timeout
        Returns:
        media information
        Since:
        3.0

      • isLTSBuild

        public static boolean isLTSBuild()

        Returns whether MobileFFmpeg release is a long term release or not.

        Returns:
        YES or NO
